description:
Time related tools like clock, timer, stopwatch, alarm, time zones and more

Japplis Watch - Clock / Timer / Stopwatch / Alarm / Time Zones / More
Japplis Watch is a set of time utilities. It contains a clock, timer, stopwatch, alarm, calendar, time zone, countdown to date, server time and pomodoro/HIIT. The window can remain always on top and be transparent.
